articles.title: Chinook Therapeutics Inc Files Patent for Treating Diabetic Kidney Disease - Pharmaceutical Technology
articles.description: Discover a groundbreaking method for treating diabetic kidney disease and chronic kidney disease associated with diabetes. This patent-approved treatment combines atrasentan and a SGLT-2 inhibitor to improve kidney function, reduce kidney damage, and enhance …
articles.content: Chinook Therapeutics. has filed a patent for a method of treating diabetic kidney disease by administering a combination of atrasentan and a SGLT-2 inhibitor. The method aims to provide a therapeutic… [+3407 chars]
